Verses: 1 saalomonin Needhimozhigal: Gnaanamulla Magan Thagappanai Sandhoshappaduththugiraan; Moodaththanamullavano Thaaikku Sanjalamaayirukkiraan.
2 aniyaayaththin Thiraviyangal Ondrukkum Udhavaadhu; Needhiyo Maranaththukkuth Thappuvikkum.
3 karththar Needhimaangalaip Pasiyinaal Varundhavidaar; Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Porulaiyo Agatrividugiraar.
4 sombarkaiyaal Velaiseygiravan Ezhaiyaavaan; Surusuruppullavan Kaiyo Selvaththai Undaakkum.
5 kodaikaalaththil Serkkiravan Buththiyulla Magan; Aruppukkaalaththil Thoongugiravano Lachchaiyai Undaakkugira Magan.
6 needhimaanudaiya Sirasinmel Aaseervaadhangal Thangum; Kodumaiyo Dhunmaarkkanudaiya Vaayai Adaikkum.
7 needhimaanudaiya Per Pugazhpetru Vilangum; Dhunmaarkkanudaiya Pero Azhindhupogum.
8 irudhayaththil Gnaanamullavan Kattalaigalai Etrukkollugiraan; Alappugira Moodano Vizhuvaan.
9 uththamamaai Nadakkiravan Baththiramaai Nadakkiraan; Konalaana Vazhigalil Nadakkiravano Kandupidikkappaduvaan.
10 kanjaadai Kaattugiravan Novu Undaakkugiraan; Alappugira Moodan Vizhuvaan.
11 needhimaanudaiya Vaai Jeevaootru; Kodumaiyo Dhunmaarkkanudaiya Vaayai Adaikkum.
12 pagai Virodhangalai Ezhuppum; Anbo Sagala Paavangalaiyum Moodum.
13 buththimaanudaiya Udhadugalil Vilanguvadhu Gnaanam; Madhikedanudaiya Mudhugukku Etradhu Pirambu.
14 gnaanavaangal Arivai Serththuvaikkiraargal; Moodanudaiya Vaaikkuk Kedu Sameebiththirukkiradhu.
15 aisuvariyavaanudaiya Porul Avanukku Aranaana Pattanam; Ezhaigalin Varumaiyo Avargalaik Kalangappannum.
16 needhimaanudaiya Prayaasam Jeevanaiyum, Dhunmaarkkanudaiya Vilaivo Paavaththaiyum Pirappikkum.
17 buththimadhigalaik Kaaththukkollugiravan Jeevavazhiyil Irukkiraan; Kandanaiyai (kandippai) Verukkiravano Mosampogiraan.
18 pagaiyai Maraikkiravan Poiudhadan; Purankoorugiravan Madhikedan.
19 sorkalin Migudhiyil Paavamillaamarpogaadhu; Than Udhadugalai Adakkugiravano Buththimaan.
20 needhimaanudaiya Naavu Suththavelli; Dhunmaarkkanudaiya Manam Arpavilaiyum Peraadhu.
21 needhimaanudaiya Udhadugal Anegaraip Poshikkum; Moodaro Madhiyeenaththinaal Maaluvaargal.
22 karththarin Aaseervaadhame Aisuvariyaththaith Tharum; Adhanode Avar Vedhanaiyaik Koottaar.
23 theevinaiseyvadhu Moodanukku Vilaiyaattu; Buththimaanukko Gnaanam Undu.
24 dhunmaarkkan Bayappadum Kaariyam Avanukku Vandhu Neridum; Needhimaan Virumbugira Kaariyam Avanukkuk Kodukkappadum.
25 suzhalkaatru Kadandhupovadhupol Dhunmaarkkan Kadandhupovaan; Needhimaano Niththiya Asthibaaramullavan.
26 parkalukkuk Kaadiyum, Kangalukkup Pugaiyum Eppadiyirukkiradho, Appadiye Somberiyum Thannai Anuppugiravargalukku Irukkiraan.
27 karththarukku Bayappadudhal Aayusunaatkalaip Perugappannum; Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Varushangalo Kurugippom.
28 needhimaangalin Nambikkai Magizhchchiyaagum; Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Abetchaiyo Azhiyum.
29 karththarin Vazhi Uththamargalukku Aran; Akkiramakkaararukko Kalakkam.
30 needhimaan Endrum Asaikkappaduvadhillai; Dhunmaarkkar Boomiyil Vasippadhillai.
31 needhimaanudaiya Vaai Gnaanaththai Velippaduththum; Maarupaadulla Naavo Aruppundupom.
32 needhimaangaludaiya Udhadugal Piriyamaanavaigalaip Pesa Ariyum; Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Vaayo Maarupaadulladhu.
